title: What font is this?
content:
can anyone help identify this font? Please its quite urgent. Or anything similar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418181315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dont_6445.jpg)
author: tyra

comments.content:
The best place for a font ID is here:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418181315/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.
